title: Virtualization plays key role in DoD IT savings
text:
30 Virtualization plays key role in DoD IT savings 
Federal Times: Virtualization was a key contributor to the Defense Departmentâ€™s saving $260 million through IT reform over a four-year span, according to the Government Accountability Office. The GAO report sought to assess the overall success of reform programs.
